Title: Monday's Child
Writer: André Du Rona (story), Noelle Gilmour, Beatriz Guido, Leopoldo Torre Nilsson
Actors: Arthur Kennedy, Geraldine Page, Deborah Reed, Graciela Borges
Plot: A married couple uproot their entire family and move to Puerto Rico where the familial tree promptly dies in the face of relentless poverty and depression.
